description:
Pearcy N, Garavaglia M, Millat T, Gilbert JP, Song Y, Hartman H, Woods C, Tomi-Andrino C, Reddy Bommareddy R, Cho BK, Fell DA, Poolman M, King JR, Winzer K, Twycross J, Minton NP. A genome-scale metabolic model of Cupriavidus necator H16 integrated with TraDIS and transcriptomic data reveals metabolic insights for biotechnological applications. PLoS Comput Biol. 2022 May 23;18(5):e1010106. doi: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1010106.

SBML downloaded from
https://github.com/SBRCNottingham/CnecatorGSM/tree/main/Model

map is from
https://github.com/m-jahn/genome-scale-models/tree/master/Ralstonia_eutropha/escher

maximum ATP/H2 yield is 1.75

ATP maintenance with LB 3

make r0009 irreversible (just to be safe)

ac in this model has formula C2H3O2 and charge 0, this is not consistent!
Actually, all metabolites in this model have a charge of 0!?!

needs some proton efflux via EX_PROTON_e for growth

RXN-15378 (M_CPD_9612 + succ <=> M_CPD_15301 + fum) is blocked
because the quinones do not participate in any other reaction
